attributes.action: Create allocated overnight parking areas for motorhomes & campers across the uk
attributes.additional_details: to allow motorhomes and campervans to park safely overnight in properly designated areas across the uk, similar to those on the continent,at the moment if you stop in a local council carpark overnight you are treated like a criminal and face a fine. simple , easy access parking for  one night stopovers  is all we are asking.
attributes.background: to allow motorhomes and campervans to park safely overnight in properly designated areas across the uk.

government_response.details:
In 2015 the Department for Communities and Local Government published statutory guidance outlining how local residents and firms can petition their council to undertake a formal review of parking policies in their area, with councillors then voting on the action to be taken. Further information is available at:  

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/right-to-challenge-parking-policies.

Department for Communities and Local Government
government_response.summary: Local authorities are responsible for determining local parking provision and they should take account of existing and projected levels of parking demand when developing local parking policies.
